name: The Breach (jmgamedesigner)
description:
The Breach is a first-person/third-person science-fiction puzzle game with shooter elements where the player must interact with the environment by activating, maneuvering, and positioning drones in order to seal breaches on the starship and escape death.  

I hope you enjoy!  Please leave a comment, letting me know your thoughts on the game.  Feel free to add me on twitter @GamingJMartin :)

The Team: 

Christian Gutierrez, Bowei Han, Brandon Jones, Javier Martin, Sergey Mysin, and Jake Roberts.

Contact Info:
